member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8
member.summary: A TouchC8 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a new TouchC8 sensor.
member.param: The socket number the sensor is plugged into.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.IsButtonPressed(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Button)
member.summary: Gets whether or not the given button is being touched by the user
member.returns: Whether or not the given button is being touched.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.IsWheelPressed
member.summary: Gets whether or not the wheel is being touched by the user.
member.returns: Whether or not the wheel is being touched.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.IsProximityDetected
member.summary: Gets whether or not the proximity detector is detecting a nearby object.
member.returns: Whether or not the sensor is detecting anything.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.GetWheelPosition
member.summary: Gets the current position of the user on the wheel in degrees.
member.returns: The degree measure of the user's location on the wheel between 0 and 360.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.GetWheelDirection
member.summary: Gets the current direction the user is moving on the wheel.
member.returns: The direction the user is moving.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.ProximityEnter
member.summary: Fires when the proximity sensor detects an object.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.ProximityExit
member.summary: Fires when the proximity sensor no longer detects an object after detecting one.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.ButtonPressed
member.summary: Fires when a button is pressed.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.ButtonReleased
member.summary: Fires when a button is released.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelPressed
member.summary: Fires when the wheel is pressed.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelReleased
member.summary: Fires when the wheel is released.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelPositionChanged
member.summary: Fires when the position of the touch on the wheel changes.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.PromixityDetectedHandler
member.summary: Delegate representing the proximity detected event.
member.param: The sensor that the detection occured on.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.ButtonTouchedHandler
member.summary: Delegate representing the button touch event.
member.param: The sensor that the event occured on.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelTouchedHandler
member.summary: Delegate representing the wheel touch event.
member.param: The sensor that the event occured on.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelPositionChangedHandler
member.summary: Delegate representing the wheel position changed event.
member.param: The sensor that the event occured on.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Button
member.summary: Represents the buttons on the sensor.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Button.Up
member.summary: The up button.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Button.Middle
member.summary: The middle button.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Button.Down
member.summary: The down button.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Direction
member.summary: Represents the direction of motion on the wheel.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Direction.Clockwise
member.summary: Clockwise motion

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.Direction.Counterclockwise
member.summary: Counterclockwise motion

member.summary: Event arguments for the WheelPositionChanged event.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelPositionChangedEventArgs.Position
member.summary: The position of the touch on the wheel between 0 and 360 degrees.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.WheelPositionChangedEventArgs.Direction
member.summary: The direction of movement on the wheel.

member.summary: Event arguments for the ButtonTouched event.

member.summary: The new state of the button.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.TouchC8.ButtonTouchedEventArgs.Button
member.summary: The button pressed or released.

member.summary: Event arguments for the PromixityDetected event.

member.summary: Whether or not the proximity was detected.
